      • register

        public StoragePortRestRep register(java.net.URI portId,
                                   java.net.URI storageSystemId)
        Registers a storage port with the given storage system by ID.

        API Call: POST /vdc/storage-systems/{storageSystemId}/storage-ports/{portId}/register

        Parameters:
        portId - the ID of the storage port.
        storageSystemId - the ID of the storage system.
        Returns:
        the updated storage port.

        API Call: POST /vdc/storage-ports/{id}/deregister

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the storage port to de-register.
